Thinking fast, you tie the rope between two gnarled stumps of dead marsh trees. The hut hurtles towards you with frightening speed, and an eerie howling fills the air - Gura Goru, spurring her hut onwards. But its legs are caught by the rope, and the whole thing comes crashing to the ground.
A scream of rage spills from the hut, along with a shower of objects - a cooking pot, some rags, firewood and the like.
